article: Hi ! I ' m Tom . This is my pencil box . It ' s orange . My ruler is blue and red . It ' s in the pencil - box . That is a pencil . It ' s black . It is not my pencil . It ' s Lucy ' s . The white eraser is Bob ' s . I call Bob at 789 - 6943 . It is his telephone number .
questions: What color is Tom ' s pencil - box ?
